original_text: Jesus then said to them, ‘People from one country will attack the people from another country. Kings and their armies will fight against other kings and their armies.
korean_text: 또 이르시되 민족이 민족을, 나라가 나라를 대적하여 일어나겠고

sentences.original_text: People from one country will attack the people from another country
sentences.korean_translation: 한 나라 사람들이 다른 나라 사람들을 공격할 것이다

sentences.original_text: will fight against other kings and their armies
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 왕들과 그들의 군대들과 싸울 것이다
